thread.title: Hidden gem in heart of Paris
thread.title_full: Hidden gem in heart of Paris - Review of Relais Hotel du Vieux Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: carlaroncoli
title: Hidden gem in heart of Paris
text:
My husband and I spent a week in this charming small hotel, a stone throw from Notre Dame and the Seine river. It is a building rich in ancient and modern history (many key figures of the beat generation stayed there when it was a lot cheaper). Rooms are elegantly decorated and display ancient wooden framing. They equipped with amenities (including well functioning wifi), and the bedding is heavenly comfortable. The manager -Monsieur Henry - goes out of his way to be hospitable (free tea room service after a cold day walking around the city is a nice touch). We go to Paris about once a year, and it was the second time we stayed at the hotel and we will definitely go back. It's an invaluable find!
Room Tip: top floor, possibly not facing street (less noise) See more room tips
